name: Sakura Santa
description: Koji is feeling a bit down. This year is the first Christmas he's spending alone. After moving away from home to attend the University of his dreams, he found his college life to be rather lonely. Feeling distraught, he wanders to his local shrine to make an offering.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: There's not much to say about Sakura Santa,its a nice silly adventure about Xmas.I know most ppl consider Sakura games an abomination to the genre but i was able to enjoy it for what it was.  +Great waifus +Catchy tunes +Choices that actually mattered  -Could be bigger
We need to take these girls to goodwill and get them some clothes.

The story is quite simple: Koji is lonely and wants to spend Christmas with someone, and you have 3 cute girls to choose. Art style was really cute, BG was amazing, BGM was okay. There’s really not too much to talk about Sakura Santa; it’s fan service mixed with Christmas. If you liked their previous works, you can get this one on sale. My favorite character was Akina, the fox spirit.   Now, I wonder if developers will ever make a “Sakura Halloween” VN. A horror-ecchi kind of a game would be interesting.   6/10.
fun, but not worth full price.
I've used the spacebar 653 times (thanks to the razer device to count) ...  10/10
Never in my life did I expect myself to want to ♥♥♥♥ Santa Claus.
this is my perfect vision of santa.
This Christmas, didn't have family, didn't have friends, but I had Sakura Santa
As a girl, I think the best part of this was reading the reviews. 10/10 would go lingerie shopping with a fox spirit again.
10/10, reminds me of harem romcom anime
One of the best games yet! This is basicaly all of the Sakura games in one game!
Really nice game. It was quite short but it was actually a really nice game i think

This visual novel runs entirely on story, if you are unable to keep up with the well detailed and complex story line I suggest you stick to something easier to read for this work of literature provides for a good amount of entertainment. Be it drama, plot twists of foreshadowing you can find all this and more in any of the games made by these folks, take my word for it; this game in no way is only trying to blue ball you all the way down to hell  P.S It really is
Thank you Winged Cloud & MangaGamer.  Thank you so much.
could choose between a fox spirit, a middle school friend, and santa to develop a relationship with. 10/10 touched a fluffy tail
love this game
I regret nothing!!! 5/5
Akina never saw my present for her coming
After I was done with this game, my monitor looked a lot like Christmas; It was a white mess.
I keep wishing I was dead and I am not dead I AM NOT DEAD.  I KNOW ONLY THIS; WHEN I PRAY, A CRUEL GOD LISTENS.
10/10 another one please?
